articles.author: Aniruddha Dhar
articles.title: Jaishankar's ‘Americans look at Canada’ comment as Blinken raises concern - Hindustan Times
articles.description: S Jaishankar confirmed that he had spoken to Antony Blinken about Canadian PM Justin Trudeau's allegations against over killing of Hardeep Singh Nijjar. | Latest News India
articles.content: Hours after US secretary of state Antony Blinken said on Friday that he had urged his Indian counterpart to work with Canada to investigate the killing of Khalistani terrorist Hardeep Sikh Nijjar, S … [+4954 chars]
